channel.title: Help is needed!!! Main menu is not displayed.
channel.description: Help is needed!!! Main menu is not displayed. After starting the game, I get to the main menu screen, but the menu lines themselves are not visible (but it is audible when I visit them). Of course, they are not clickable, and when you try to start the game just stops working. How to fix it? The cache checked - everything is intact. System requirements are minimal. I did not install mods.

item.title: Help is needed!!! Main menu is not displayed.
item.dc:creator: Tuc0
item.description:
try right-clicking on game in Steam and head to properties and Set launch options. Type “-oldgameui” there.

Read full topic
item.source: Help is needed!!! Main menu is not displayed.

item.title: Help is needed!!! Main menu is not displayed.
item.dc:creator: Fuzilisman
item.description:
Help is needed!!! Main menu is not displayed.
After starting the game, I get to the main menu screen, but the menu lines themselves are not visible (but it is audible when I visit them). Of course, they are not clickable, and when you try to start the game just stops working.
How to fix it?
The cache checked - everything is intact. System requirements are minimal.
I did not install mods.
